pli-tv-pvr1.6:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, what is the legal issue among the four kinds of legal issues?
pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.2: It is a legal issue arising from an offense. …
pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.1: When it comes to the offense for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, what is the legal issue among the four kinds of legal issues?
pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.2: Of the four legal questions it is the legal question concerning offences.
pli-tv-pvr1.6:3.1: Concluded is the Sixth Chapter: that on Legal Questions
